data.title: In the presence of mine enemies : war in the heart of...
data.meta_description: Reassessing the history of the Civil War, a leading historian chronicles the path to war in the Great Valley spanning Pennsylvania and Virginia, capturing the experience of war in the lives of the people who lived through it.
data.text:
APA Citation, 7th Edition (style guide)

Ayers, E. L. (2003). In the presence of mine enemies: war in the heart of America, 1859-1863 . W.W. Norton.

Chicago / Turabian - Author Date Citation, 17th Edition (style guide)

Ayers, Edward L., 1953-. 2003. In the Presence of Mine Enemies: War in the Heart of America, 1859-1863. W.W. Norton.

Chicago / Turabian - Humanities (Notes and Bibliography) Citation, 17th Edition (style guide)

Ayers, Edward L., 1953-. In the Presence of Mine Enemies: War in the Heart of America, 1859-1863 W.W. Norton, 2003.

MLA Citation, 9th Edition (style guide)

Ayers, Edward L. In the Presence of Mine Enemies: War in the Heart of America, 1859-1863 W.W. Norton, 2003.
